name: Estrus Princess
description:
It's time for the princess to go to town and search for a potential groom.
Recommended.
You can relax and play because there is no battle.
For those who like cute illustrations and hentai illustrations.
Those who want to immerse themselves in a relaxing and peaceful world.
It creates a cheerful atmosphere that has not been seen in previous sexual games.
Exploration and conversation
There are various people in the town. Visit unique people and ask them about their problems and requests.
When you solve the problem, you can move on to the next step. Sometimes you may end up in a naughty situation.
Interacting with the people of the town is important to the story.
Hints for the next step
You will not get lost because you will automatically get a note to help you know what to do next.
Provides a comfortable playing experience.
Features
Although it is in the form of an RPG, it can be easily compared to a novel game where you move around in a map.
The main focus is on conversation and releasing sexual scenes.
Eventually, you will find your son-in-law. This is a game to enjoy the process of becoming a princess.
Sexual Events
There are a total of 10 types of events.
You will proceed to the event scene by having conversations and receiving requests.
Graphic Art
Illustrations and dots are originals created by the producer from the beginning.
10 basic CG pictures (total 72 pictures including differences and standing pictures)
Manual, strategy, and high-resolution illustrations used are included in the game folder.
